objects.description: [Sandworm Team](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0034) conducted technical reconnaissance of the Parliament of Georgia's official internet domain prior to its 2019 attack.(Citation: US District Court Indictment GRU Unit 74455 October 2020)
